name: CSV with schema
description:
This example will read csv files and write them to Kafka parsing them to the
schema specified in ``key.schema`` and ``value.schema``.
note:
The data for the following example is formatted as such.
id,first_name,last_name,email,gender,ip_address,last_login,account_balance,country,favorite_color
